!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of Duty* is only given to those who pass the Trial of Duty. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. To receive the *Mark of Dury*, go to Giran Castle Town and meet Warehouse Keeper Valkon. The *Mark of Fate* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Fate. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Fate, go to *Giran Castle Town and meet Dark Elven Magister Kaira*. And finally the *Mark of Witchcraft* is only given to those who pass the Test of Witchcraft. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of Witchcraft, go to the *Corridor of Death and visit Orim of the Shadow*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/03.htm|Return]Â
